pages.title: Fin Whale
pages.text: It is the second-longest species of cetacean on Earth after the blue whale.$(br2)"The fin whale's body is long and slender, coloured brownish-grey with a paler underside.$(br2)At least two recognized subspecies exist, in the North Atlantic and the Southern Hemisphere.

pages.title: Fin Whale
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
